Son/daughter of the soil.

The FarmPe has been launched at the state level event organized for farming community.Honorable chief minister Yeddyurappa and Industrialist Vijay Sankeshwar visited the event and FarmPe CEO Mallikarjun Ragi and FarmPe team witnessed the event.
